import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Create(){ const [values, setValues] = useState({ title: '', amountCollected: '', totalVolumes: '', mangaPublisher: '' }) const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = (e)=> { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:8081/book', values) .then(res =>{ console.log(res); navigate('/') }) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) } return(

setValues({...values, totalVolumes: e.target.value})}/>
setValues({...values, publisher: e.target.value})}/>
